overview: Weather Report performing live in Hamburg on German TV show Beat Club on 22.06.1971.  Joe Zawinul: Fender Rhodes / Wayne Shorter: Tenor and Soprano saxophones  Miroslav Vitous: Electric and acoustic bass / Alphonse Mouzon: Drums / Dom Um Rom√£o: Percussion  1. Umbrellas 2. Orange Lady 3. Waterfall 4. Seventh Arrow  5. TH 6. Morning Lake 7. Improvised Medley incl. Dr. Honoris Causa
title: Weather Report Live In Hamburg 1971
